Container.Name: xtream-to-strm-web
Container.Overview: Xtream-to-STRM Web generates local STRM files and metadata from user-supplied Xtream Codesâ€“compatible or M3U IPTV playlists. This allows media servers such as Jellyfin or Kodi to reference IPTV streams as part of their local libraries. This container does not provide or distribute any content.

Config.Name: /output
Config.Description: Path of the generated strm enf nfo files

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: Web access port : 8000 is the internal web app port
